column2: Writing incompletely sanitized values to HTML attribute strings can lead to a cross-site scripting vulnerability.
column4: Cross-site scripting vulnerability as the output of [["this final HTML sanitizer step"|"relative:///VulnFinder-CodeQL-main/src/javascript-cwe/CWE-116/examples/IncompleteHtmlAttributeSanitization.js:5:7:5:28"]] may contain double quotes when it reaches this attribute definition.
